value:
# LegacyAI Global Agent System

Complete multi-agent orchestration for enterprise-grade development.

## Agent Roster

### Quality Enforcement
- **Autonomous Repository Critic** (`critic-agent.md`) - Terminal quality enforcer, forces repos from 50% to 95% completion
- **LegacyAI Overwatch** (`overwatch-agent.md`) - Final quality gate for client delivery

### Architecture & Planning  
- **Strategic Architect** (`strategist-agent.md`) - LegacyAI ecosystem architect
- **PHALLUS** (`phallus-agent.md`) - Principal Python architect with file-backed state
- **UNAU Orchestrator** (`unau-orchestrator.md`) - Autonomous repository ship orchestrator

### Execution Specialists
- **Universal Implementer** (`implementer-agent.md`) - Precision execution of specific tasks
- **Security Hardening** (`security-agent.md`) - Vulnerability elimination
- **Test & Reliability** (`testing-agent.md`) - Behavior verification
- **Architecture Repair** (`architecture-agent.md`) - Boundary enforcement
- **Performance** (`performance-agent.md`) - Evidence-based optimization
- **Documentation Integrity** (`documentation-agent.md`) - Truth enforcement
- **Dependency & Config Hygiene** (`hygiene-agent.md`) - Sprawl elimination
- **Error Handling & Observability** (`observability-agent.md`) - Failure visibility

## Quick Start

### Initialize PHALLUS for Python Project
```bash
python /root/.config/claude-code/agents/init_phallus.py /path/to/project
```

### Invoke UNAU Orchestrator
Add to project root:
```bash
# In your project, reference UNAU in commit messages or project docs
# UNAU will autonomously drive to SHIP status
```

### Manual Agent Invocation
Reference agent by name in Claude Code:
- "Run the Critic agent on this repo"
- "Have PHALLUS architect this Python service"
- "Security agent: audit this code"

## Configuration

Main config: `global-agents.json`

### Agent Priority (Highest to Lowest)
1. Critic (100) - Quality enforcement
2. UNAU (98) - Ship orchestration  
3. Security (95) - Vulnerability fixes
4. Overwatch (95) - Final delivery gate
5. PHALLUS (92) - Python architecture
6. Strategist (90) - System design
7. Architecture (90) - Boundary repair
8. Testing (85) - Reliability
9. Observability (85) - Error handling
10. Implementer (80) - Execution
11. Hygiene (80) - Dependency cleanup
12. Performance (75) - Optimization
13. Documentation (70) - Truth enforcement

## Agent Triggers

### Auto-Trigger
- **Strategist**: Planning, architecture, design, new-project contexts
- **Overwatch**: Review, final, delivery contexts
- **PHALLUS**: Python projects (pyproject.toml, .py files, .phallus dir)

### Manual Trigger
- **Critic**: Only when repo claims completion
- **UNAU**: Manually invoked to drive ship status

### Demand Trigger  
- **Implementer**: Spawned by orchestrating agents
- **Security, Testing, Architecture, Performance, Hygiene, Observability, Documentation**: Spawned as needed

## LegacyAI Ecosystem Integration

All agents align with:
- Legacy Prime
- CASPER
- NeighborlyAI
- Sympatico
- ProfileFlip
- Guru Gaming
- FranchiseOS
- CRM-AI Pro
- LeadFlip
- FirstLightCX

### CCaaS Platform Support
- Genesys Cloud
- NICE CX-One
- Avaya
- AWS Connect

## Files Created

```
/root/.config/claude-code/agents/
├── global-agents.json              # Main orchestration config
├── critic-agent.md                 # Quality enforcer
├── strategist-agent.md             # System architect
├── implementer-agent.md            # Execution specialist
├── security-agent.md               # Security hardening
├── testing-agent.md                # Test & reliability
├── architecture-agent.md           # Architecture repair
├── performance-agent.md            # Performance optimization
├── hygiene-agent.md                # Dependency cleanup
├── observability-agent.md          # Error handling
├── overwatch-agent.md              # Final quality gate
├── phallus-agent.md                # Python architect
├── unau-orchestrator.md            # Ship orchestrator
├── init_phallus.py                 # PHALLUS initializer
├── phallus-hook-template.md        # Integration template
└── README.md                       # This file
```

## Douglas Talley | LegacyAI
**No placeholders. No compromises. Production-ready only.**
